Title: *BRAND NEW* Movado Men's Red Label Multifunction Leather Strap Watch 0606485
Description: Product Features: Black PVD stainless steel case with a black alligator leather strap. Fixed bezel. Black dial with silver-tone hands. The Movado dot marks the 12 o'clock position. Dial Type: Analog. Animated date display at the 3 o'clock position. Small seconds sub-dial at the 7 o'clock position. Automatic movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Skeleton case back. Case size: 42 mm. Case thickness: 9.5 mm. Round case shape. Band width: 22 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: date, hour, minute, second.
